text: Robert Joseph Bare Sr. (born April 7, 1935) is an American outlaw country music singer-songwriter. He is best known for the songs "Marie Laveau", "Detroit City" and "500 Miles Away from Home". ==References== Category:1935 births Category:Living people Category:American rock guitarists Category:American rock singers Category:American country guitarists Category:American country singers Category:Musicians from Ohio Category:Singers from Ohio Category:Writers from Ohio Category:American singer-songwriters
title: Bobby Bare
